font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 榨取（财富、信息等）： to draw or coerce profit or advantage from illicitly or to an extreme degree
【例】 milk the workers 从工人身上榨取好处‖The interrogators milked the arrested spy, but he was dry. 审问者想尽办法套被捕间谍的话，但是无功而返
【近】 drain, exploit

【记】 milk 奶，挤奶，引申为榨取
